name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kevin J. RANKIN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Rankin
docket_number: No. 456 Disciplinary Docket No. 2; Disciplinary Board Nos. 18 DB 87 and 135 DB 89

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of ROLF LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1998.
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kevin J. RANKIN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 11th day of August, 1994, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated February 7, 1994, it is hereby
ORDERED that Kevin J. Rankin be and he is disbarred from the Bar of this Commonwealth, retroactive to March 6, 1987, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. It is further.ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of ROLF LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1998.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
647 A.2d 199
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Kevin J. RANKIN, Respondent.
No. 456 Disciplinary Docket No. 2.
Disciplinary Board Nos. 18 DB 87 and 135 DB 89.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 11, 1994.
